content.summary: This is my first test blog post for the Outreachy summer intership at Cadasta.
content.title: A first post for a first job

about.blurb:
##### Hello World! Welcome to my coding blog!
I'm a fuzzy   [***koala coder***](http://koalacoder.com) and here I write about my experience as an [Outreachy](https://www.gnome.org/outreachy/) intern at [Cadasta](http://cadasta.org).
After studying politics and international developement, I decided to self-learn programming and I'm excited to share *challenges*, *joys* and *lessons learnt* along the way.
My posts highlight the reality of studying and working on **open source, remote and tech-for-good projects.**
